availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen Cunningham (Morgan County, Indiana, laborer and private (U.S.A.))

body.p: Morgan County, Indiana, laborer and soldier. Indiana native. Son of Hugh Cunningham and Sarah Cunningham. Married to Sarah McGowen Cunningham in Morgan County, Indiana, on December 25, 1862. Attended school in Morgan County, Indiana, in 1850. Laborer in Morgan County in 1860. Served in the 33rd Indiana Infantry (U. S. A.) as a private from September 3, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Morgan County, Washington, p. 33B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Morgan County, Washington, p. 903.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Mortality Schedules, Indiana, Daviess County, Washington, p. 201.
Indiana Marriage Records, 1801-1952, Indiana Archives and Record Administration, Office of the Morgan County Clerk. Morgan County, Indiana, Marriage Records, volume D, 1859- 1866, p. 280.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Indiana, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M540, Roll 0017.
